prokimenon: O Lord, save me by Your name,
and in Your power be a judge for me.
O God, hear my prayer; listen to the words of my mouth.
second_prokimenon: Let Israel hope in the Lord,
Lord, my heart is not exalted, nor are my eyes lofty.
aposticha: The springtime of the Fast has dawned,* the flower of repentance has budded forth.* O brethren, let us cleanse ourselves from all impurity* and chant to the Giver of Light, saying:* Glory be to You who alone loves mankind.

Your martyrs, O Lord, strengthened by faith and hope,* united in soul by the love of Your Cross,* destroyed the tyranny of the enemy;* and, having received crowns of glory,* they intercede together with the bodiless hosts,* on behalf of our souls.
First in holiness among the saints,* the praise of the heavenly hosts,* the hymn of the apostles,* the cause and reason of the prophets,* O Sovereign Lady, accept our prayers.
